translated: The Discourse on Distinguishing and Correcting, Scroll 1
Composed by Monk Xuan Yi of the Great White Horse Temple
A young man stuck in worldly affairs asked Mr. Zhenzheng: I have been deaf to worldly affairs for a long time. My feelings
are still not clear about the great path.
Born in the last generation,
my mind is confused about the principle of understanding.
I always hesitate in what I hear and see.
I tread the forked road with hesitation.
In the end, I am stuck and confused by words and speech.
I look up to the level path but stumble.
I have harbored this confusion for many years.
I hope you will point the way south and remove my knowledge of north.
Mr. Zhenzheng then concealed his intentions and replied:
When I was young, I heard the Book of Poetry and the Book of Rites. When I grew up, I loved the ancient texts.
I indulged in them for years and never tired of searching through them.
The records in the books and the writings recorded
the political transformation of emperors and the teachings of sages and saints.
There is nothing that I did not distinguish right from wrong and discuss in detail the errors.
For a long time, I have accumulated the mirror on the spiritual platform.
I regret that there is no one to discuss with me.
You now ask questions.
You do not lose the meaning of your words.
The prince knelt and said:ğŸ”½The books that record events,
The histories of the dynasties,
Relate the dregs of ancient people,
Truly the hut of the former kings.
This is the talk of the end of the world,
How can it be worth discussing?
As for Shakyamuni's exemplary teachings and the Dharma King's transformations,
They transcend the Nine Streams and walk alone.
They traverse myriad eons and look down upon all.
Words and images do not describe their ultimate realm.
The foolish and wise cannot fathom their beginnings.
It is as if ten scenes illuminate the blue sky.
It is as if the Nine Oceans float in the blue sea.
This is indeed the sacred purpose of transcending the world,
I do not need to discuss it one or two times.
As for the teachings of the Way,
Their origins are ancient.ğŸ”½Starting from the writings of the Yellow Emperor,
Up to the classics of Laozi.
The essentials of cultivating the body and governing the country,
The merits of prolonging life and preserving health,
The rules of tranquility, retirement, and purity,
The virtue of the female is gentleness and simplicity.
Compassion and frugality are the functions of the strong.
The ability to blunt sharpness and resolve disputes.
Truly benefits ordinary people's feelings.
Certainly does not harm the government of the times.
There is a reason for punishing oneself and restraining the state.
Recently, Wu and Shu divided the territory, and Song and Qi succeeded in governing.
They separately established Tianzun as the teacher of the teaching.
According to the sutras and treatises they speak of.
Tianzun is the patriarch of the Way and its teachings.
The ultimate position of the mysterious gate.
Honored by the celestial beings.
Therefore, he is called Tianzun.
Originating before creation.
The beginning of yin and yang.
Generating heaven and earth, nurturing the universe.
All things rely on it to establish form.
The three luminaries receive it to form images.
Based on this presentation.
Tianzun is before heaven and earth.
The teacher is rich in learning from Mount Peng and has skills from the Stone Room.
His Way encompasses Confucian history and his knowledge discerns the subtle.Here is the corrected and aligned text:
A bright mirror is hung high, and things come to be reflected in it.
A great bell is waiting to be struck, I dare to follow the lower wind.
Please resolve my deep doubts.
Hopefully, the confused will return.
The master then looked up to the sky and sighed, saying:
This confusion is indeed widespread.
How can it be unique to you alone?
Please sit down.ğŸ”½I will discuss it with you.
As for the teachings of the Dao,
They originated with the Yellow Emperor.
And continued with Laozi.
It is truly as you have said.
As for the Heavenly Venerable,ğŸ”½How is it false and deceptive?
How is it empty and pretentious?
Listen attentively,
I will analyze and explain it for you.
Beyond the universe, what is beyond the reach of words and discussions,
No one can know it.
Within heaven and earth, what is perceived by the ears and eyes,
Can all be thoroughly investigated and examined.ğŸ”½I have read the books and histories,
The traces of ancient people recorded in the bamboo slips and wooden tablets, and transmitted by calligraphy and ink,
I have seen them all.
I will now rely on historical records and classical texts to tell you.
According to the Zhouyi Gouming Jue,
before heaven and earth were divided,
there was the Great Simplicity.ğŸ”½There was the Great Beginning.
There was the Great Commencement.ğŸ”½There was the Great Pervasion.
There was the Great Ultimate.
These are called the Five Periods.
The commentary explains:
The state before qi and form are distinguished is called the Great Simplicity.ğŸ”½When the primordial qi first begins to stir, it is called the Great Beginning.
When qi begins to take form, it is called the Great Commencement.
When form changes and takes substance, it is called the Great Pervasion.
When substance and form are fully present, it is called the Great Ultimate.
When the five qi gradually change, it is called the Five Periods.
This refers to the state where qi, form, and substance are present but not yet separated from each other.
All of these are called the Great Simplicity, the Great Pervasion, and so on.
Moreover, according to the Yiwai Tonggua,
the Yijing has the Great Ultimate, which gives rise to the two principles.
The clear and light qi floats above to form heaven.
The turbid and heavy qi condenses below to form earth.
Heaven and earth harmonize to give birth to humans.
Using the human being,
It is called the Three Powers.
Moreover, according to the preface to the Book of Changes, it says:
There are Heaven, Earth, and the myriad things.
Only then are the ruler and minister established, the father and son determined,
And the rites of the eldest son and husband and wife,
The distinctions of honor and lowliness, high and low.
Based on this,
Before the Great Simplicity, the colors of qi were not yet divided, and the forms and images were not yet formed.
It was a state of chaos, obscurity, and indistinctness.
Once the two forms were distinguished, Heaven and Earth had their shapes.
With the three luminaries illuminating, the qi and forms were visible.
Yin and yang interacted, and people were born.
From then on, the Three Powers were complete.
These are all explained in the historical records.
They are as clear as pointing to one's palm.
If the Heavenly Venerable originally had no form or color,
Then he is no different from the Great Simplicity.
He cannot be born before the Five Operas.
If he has form and color,
Then he is born within the Three Powers.
He cannot be before the Great Simplicity.
Moreover, before the Great Ultimate, there was no form or image.
It is clear that the Celestial Worthy should not have a form.
If he shares the same qi as the Great Ultimate,
after the Great Ultimate, he is born together with the Three Powers, receiving a form.
This is being born and nurtured by yin, yang, heaven, and earth.
How can he give birth to heaven and earth?
Please investigate this principle, and the truth will naturally be revealed.
There is no need to seek elsewhere, just examine the classics and histories.
The young man was startled and said:
What you have discussed, Master, is indeed false.

Since the Heavenly Emperor initiated the imperial enterprise,
the years of the Human Emperor have been far-reaching.
The five surnames are the basis of his ancestry.
The seventy-two surnames branch out into his extensive lineage.

At that time, writing had not yet been invented, and the customs were still simple and unadorned.

From this point onward,
historians were established.
can be clearly seen.
It is equipped with various strategies.

Judging from this,
it is sufficient to clarify its falsehood.

Six times six is thirty-six.
